SwiftMessageFormat.name: MT600
SwiftMessageFormat.Description:
This message type is exchanged by or on behalf of the institutions or corporates, party A and party B, which have agreed to a commodity trade. This message is also used when one of the trading parties is a fund manager.
It is used to confirm the details of:
a) a new contract between the parties
b) an amendment to a previously agreed contract
c) the cancellation of a contract
d) the settlement of a commodity option which has been exercised.
This message may also be exchanged to confirm the liquidation of a forward deal.
In some cases, only one of the financial institutions involved in a contract will send a confirmation to the second financial institution. These cases include:
a) retransmission due to errors in a previously sent confirmation
b) additional information about a previously confirmed contract, (eg, to provide the name of the party in field 57a and/or 87a, in those cases where the previous confirmation contained the code UNKNOWN).

Validation.Comment: This field must not start or end with a slash '/' and must not contain two consecutive slashes '//' (Error code(s): T26).
This field must not start or end with a slash '/' and must not contain two consecutive slashes '//' (Error code(s): T26).
One of the following codes must be used(Error code(s): T36)

Code.Name: AGNT
Code.Description: Sender/Receiver is sending/receiving the message on behalf of a third party.

Code.Name: BILA
Code.Description: Bilateral confirmation, ie, the Sender and the Receiver are the principals.

Code.Name: BROK
Code.Description: The confirmation is sent by a money broker.

Validation.Comment: Identifier Code must be a registered BIC or BEI (Error code(s): T27,T28,T29,T45)
In option J, Party Identification must be specified as a list of pairs (Code)(Value) and the following codes and format must be used (Error code(s): T78).

Code.Name: ABIC
Code.Description: followed by the BIC/BEI or UKWN if BIC/BEI not known

Code.Name: ACCT
Code.Description: followed by the account number

Code.Name: ADD1
Code.Description: followed by the first line of the address

Code.Name: ADD2
Code.Description: followed by the second line of the address

Code.Name: CITY
Code.Description: followed by the city (and state, country)

Code.Name: CLRC
Code.Description: followed by a clearing code

Code.Name: GBSC
Code.Description: followed by UK domestic sort code

Code.Name: LEIC
Code.Description: Legal Entity Identifier

Code.Name: NAME
Code.Description: followed by the name

Code.Name: USCH
Code.Description: followed by CHIPS UID

Code.Name: USFW
Code.Description: followed by FedWire Routing Number

Validation.Comment: CreditDebit must contain the following codes (Error Code:T51)
Identifier Code must be a registered BIC or BEI (Error code(s): T27,T28,T29,T45)
In option J, Party Identification must be specified as a list of pairs (Code)(Value) and the following codes and format must be used (Error code(s): T78).

Validation.Comment: CreditDebit must contain the following codes (Error Code:T51)
Date must be a valid date expressed as YYMMDD (Error code(s): T50).
Allocation must contain one of the following codes (Error code(s): T03):

Code.Name: ALLOC
Code.Description: Specifies the commodity is allocated

Code.Name: UNALL
Code.Description: Specifies the commodity is unallocated

Validation.Comment: Delivery Details must contain one of the following codes (Error code(s): T35):
Currency must be a valid ISO 4217 currency code (Error code(s): T52).
Code must contain the following code (Error code(s): T07):

Code.Name: SEE72
Code.Description: Indicates that more information can be found in field 72

Option.Name: H
Option.Description: Type, Date, Version of the Agreement

Validation.Comment: Date must be a valid date expressed as YYYYMMDD (Error code(s): T50).
Version must be a valid year expressed YYYY. It must not consist entirely of zeros (Error code(s): T50).
Type must be specified using one of the following codes (Error code(s): T47)

Code.Name: ISDA
Code.Description: ISDA Master Agreement

Code.Name: OTHER
Code.Description: Another type of bilateral agreement signed up front between party A and party B. The agreement must be specified in field 77D

Validation.Comment: Unit must contain one of the following codes (Error code(s): T06):
Identifier Code must be a registered BIC or BEI (Error code(s): T27,T28,T29,T45)

Identifier Code must not be a BEI. Please refer to the latest version of the BIC Directory- Corporations for more information about BEIs. This error code applies to all types of BICs referenced in a FIN message including SWIFT BICs, non-SWIFT BICs, Masters, Synonyms, Live destinations and Test & Training destinations .(Error code(s): C05).
CreditDebit must contain the following codes (Error Code:T51)
Identifier Code must be a registered BIC or BEI (Error code(s): T27,T28,T29,T45)
Identifier Code must not be a BEI, ie, must not be of subtype BEID, MCCO, TESP or TRCO (Error code(s): C05).
CreditDebit must contain the following codes (Error Code:T51)
Date must be a valid date expressed as YYMMDD (Error code(s): T50).
Currency must be a valid ISO 4217 currency code (Error code(s): T52).
The number of digits following the comma must not exceed the maximum allowed for that specified currency (Error code(s): C03).

Validation.Comment: Identifier Code must be a registered BIC (Error code(s): T27,T28,T29,T45)
CreditDebit must contain the following codes (Error Code:T51)
Identifier Code must be a registered BIC (Error code(s): T27,T28,T29,T45).

Validation.Comment: CreditDebit must contain the following codes (Error Code:T51)
One of the following codes must be used in Side Indicator (Error code(s): T36):

Code.Name: C
Code.Description: The clearing broker identification is for the client leg.

Code.Name: P
Code.Description: The clearing broker identification is for the Central Counterparty (CCP) leg.

Validation.Comment: The following codes must be used (Error code(s): T36):

Code.Name: N
Code.Description: The contract is below the clearing threshold

Code.Name: Y
Code.Description: The contract is above the clearing threshold

Option.Name: B
Option.Specification: (Identification of Instrument)(Description of Instrument) |(Description of Instrument)

Validation.Comment: The following codes must be used (Error code(s): T67):

Code.Name: A
Code.Description: Post-allocation

Code.Name: P
Code.Description: Pre-allocation

Code.Name: U
Code.Description: Unallocated

Validation.Comment: The following codes must be used (Error code(s): T67):

Code.Name: F
Code.Description: Fully collateralised

Code.Name: O
Code.Description: One-way collateralised

Code.Name: P
Code.Description: Partially collateralised

Code.Name: U
Code.Description: Uncollateralised

Validation.Comment: UTC Indicator must be a valid time expressed as HH[MM] (Error code(s): T39).
Sign ([N]) must not be used when UTC Indicator is equal to all zeroes (Error code(s): T14).
Time must be a valid time expressed as HHMMSS (Error code(s): T38).
Date must be a valid date expressed as YYYYMMDD (Error code(s): T50).
The following code must be used (Error code(s): T36):

Code.Name: Y
Code.Description: The transaction is non-standard.

Option.Name: Y
Option.Description: Financial Nature of the Counterparty Indicator

Validation.Comment: Indicator must contain one of the following codes (Error code(s): T67)

Code.Name: F
Code.Description: The party is a financial counterparty

Code.Name: N
Code.Description: The party is a non-financial counterparty

Validation.Comment: Indicator must contain one of the following codes (Error code(s): T36):

Code.Name: N
Code.Description: The collateral is posted on a trade by trade basis

Code.Name: Y
Code.Description: The collateral is posted at a portfolio level

Validation.Comment: Indicator must contain one of the following codes (Error code(s): T36):

Code.Name: N
Code.Description: The trade is not the result of a portfolio compression exercise.

Code.Name: Y
Code.Description: The trade is the result of a portfolio compression exercise.

Validation.Comment: Indicator must contain one of the following codes (Error code(s): T36):

Code.Name: N
Code.Description: No, the counterparty is domiciled inside the EEA.

Code.Name: Y
Code.Description: Yes, the counterparty is domiciled outside the EEA.

Validation.Comment: Indicator must contain one of the following codes (Error code(s): T36):

Code.Name: N
Code.Description: No, the reported trade does not fall under the definition of an intragroup transaction.

Code.Name: Y
Code.Description: Yes, the reported trade falls under the definition of an intragroup transaction.

Validation.Comment: Indicator must contain one of the following codes (Error code(s): T36):

Code.Name: N
Code.Description: No, the contract is not directly linked to the non-financial counterparty's commercial or treasury financing activity.

Code.Name: Y
Code.Description: Yes, the contract is directly linked to the non-financial counterparty's commercial or treasury financing activity.

fieldvalidation.name: U09
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "User has used tag 119 in a message that is not a candidate for special processing"

fieldvalidation.name: U12
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "When populating an end-to-end reference, both fields 111 and 121 must be populated: a message that contains only one of these two fields will not be accepted by FIN."

fieldvalidation.name: U03
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "Invalid format! Format must be 'xxxxxxxx-xxxx-4xxx-yxxx-xxxxxxxxxxxx' where x is any hexadecimal character (lower case only) and y is one of 8, 9, a, or b."

fieldvalidation.name: C1
fieldvalidation.comment: "Either sequence B or sequence C, but not both, must be present."
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "Either sequence B or sequence C, but not both, must be present."

fieldvalidation.name: C3-1
fieldvalidation.comment: "The currency in the amount fields 33G and 34P or 34R must be the same for all occurrences of these fields in the message."
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "The currency in the amount fields 33G and 34P or 34R must be the same for all occurrences of these fields in the message."

fieldvalidation.name: C3-2
fieldvalidation.comment: "The currency in the amount fields 33G and 34P or 34R must be the same for all occurrences of these fields in the message."
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "The currency in the amount fields 33G and 34P or 34R must be the same for all occurrences of these fields in the message."

fieldvalidation.name: C4
fieldvalidation.comment: C4 In Sequence A , if subfield 1 of field 77H is OTHER then field 77D in Sequence A is mandatory else it is optional(Error code(s): D36)
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "In Sequence A , if subfield 1 of field 77H is OTHER then field 77D in Sequence A is mandatory else it is optional"

fieldvalidation.name: C5
fieldvalidation.formula: If($value == "GOLD", Implies(B.$size > 0, !In(B[0].F32F[0].Unit, "GOZ", "TOZ")) && Implies(C.$size > 0, !In(C[0].F32F[0].Unit, "GOZ", "TOZ")), Implies(In($value, "PALL", "PLAT", "SILV"), Implies(B.$size > 0, !In(B[0].F32F[0].Unit, "FOZ", "TOZ")) && Implies(C.$size > 0, !In(C[0].F32F[0].Unit, "FOZ", "TOZ"))))
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "When GOLD is defined in subfield 4 (Type) of field 26C under sequence A, then the Unit in field 32F under sequence B and sequence C must not be GOZ nor TOZ. If subfield 4 (Type) of field 26C under sequence A is one of PALL or PLAT or SILV, then the Unit in field 32F under sequence B and sequence C must be must not be FOZ nor TOZ."

fieldvalidation.name: C6
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "In sequence D, field 15D may not be the only field, that is, if field 15D is present, then at least one of the other fields of sequence D must be present (Error code(s): C98)."

fieldvalidation.name: C8
fieldvalidation.comment: In sequence D, when field 17Z is "Y" then 22Q must be present (Error code(s): C56).
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "In sequence D, when field 17Z is 'Y' then 22Q must be present (Error code(s): C56)."

fieldvalidation.name: FA-22-A
fieldvalidation.comment: "The bank and location codes of the Sender and Receiver must appear in alphabetical order (letters take precedence over numbers)."
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "The bank and location codes of the Sender and Receiver must appear in alphabetical order (letters take precedence over numbers)."

fieldvalidation.name: FA-22-B
fieldvalidation.comment: "The codes are separated by four digits, which must consist of the rightmost non-zero digits of the price per unit (ie, Price Per Unit of field 33G), preceded by the three digits to the left of it. If there are no digits to the left of it, the space must be zero-filled."
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "The codes are separated by four digits, which must consist of the rightmost non-zero digits of the price per unit (ie, Price Per Unit of field 33G), preceded by the three digits to the left of it. If there are no digits to the left of it, the space must be zero-filled."

fieldvalidation.name: FA-22-C
fieldvalidation.comment: $value + " is not a valid Code value. In confirmations sent by both financial institutions, Code must contain one of the following codes: NEW, AMEND, CANCEL, EXOPTION, NOTICE. In confirmations sent by one financial institution, Code must contain one of the following codes: CORRECT, COMPLETE." (This is not a NVR)
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: $value + " is not a valid Code value. In confirmations sent by both financial institutions, Code must contain one of the following codes: NEW, AMEND, CANCEL, EXOPTION, NOTICE. In confirmations sent by one financial institution, Code must contain one of the following codes: CORRECT, COMPLETE."

fieldvalidation.name: FA-26C-A1
fieldvalidation.comment: "When Type is AMEG, Denomination must be one of the following: 50, 25, 10, 5."
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "When Type is AMEG, Denomination must be one of the following: 50, 25, 10, 5."

fieldvalidation.name: FA-26C-A2
fieldvalidation.comment: "When Type is ANUG, Denomination must be one of the following: 1/1, 1/2, 1/4, 1/10."
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "When Type is ANUG, Denomination must be one of the following: 1/1, 1/2, 1/4, 1/10."

fieldvalidation.name: FA-26C-A3
fieldvalidation.comment: "When Type is CORO, Denomination must be one of the following: 100, 20, 10."
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "When Type is CORO, Denomination must be one of the following: 100, 20, 10."

fieldvalidation.name: FA-26C-A4
fieldvalidation.comment: "When Type is BRIT, Denomination must be one of the following: 1/1, 1/2, 1/4, 1/10."
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "When Type is BRIT, Denomination must be one of the following: 1/1, 1/2, 1/4, 1/10."

fieldvalidation.name: FA-26C-A5
fieldvalidation.comment: "When Type is DUCA, Denomination must be one of the following: 4, 1."
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "When Type is DUCA, Denomination must be one of the following: 4, 1."

fieldvalidation.name: FA-26C-A6
fieldvalidation.comment: "When Type is FRFR, Denomination must be one of the following: 20."
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "When Type is FRFR, Denomination must be one of the following: 20."

fieldvalidation.name: FA-26C-A7
fieldvalidation.comment: "When Type is GECU, Denomination must be one of the following: 50."
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "When Type is GECU, Denomination must be one of the following: 50."

fieldvalidation.name: FA-26C-A8
fieldvalidation.comment: "When Type is KRUG, Denomination must be one of the following: 1/1, 1/2, 1/4, 1/10."
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "When Type is KRUG, Denomination must be one of the following: 1/1, 1/2, 1/4, 1/10."

fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "When Type is LBTY, Denomination must be one of the following: 20, 10, 5."

fieldvalidation.name: FA-26C-A10
fieldvalidation.comment: "When Type is MAPL, Denomination must be one of the following: 1/1, 1/2, 1/4, 1/10."
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "When Type is MAPL, Denomination must be one of the following: 1/1, 1/2, 1/4, 1/10."

fieldvalidation.name: FA-26C-A11
fieldvalidation.comment: "When Type is MEXP, Denomination must be one of the following: 50, 20, 10, 5."
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "When Type is MEXP, Denomination must be one of the following: 50, 20, 10, 5."

fieldvalidation.name: FA-26C-A12
fieldvalidation.comment: "When Type is NSOV, Denomination must be one of the following: 1/1, 1/2."
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "When Type is NSOV, Denomination must be one of the following: 1/1, 1/2."

fieldvalidation.name: FA-26C-A13
fieldvalidation.comment: "When Type is NOBL, Denomination must be one of the following: 1/1."
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "When Type is NOBL, Denomination must be one of the following: 1/1."

fieldvalidation.name: FA-26C-A14
fieldvalidation.comment: "When Type is OSOV, Denomination must be one of the following: 1/1, 1/2."
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "When Type is OSOV, Denomination must be one of the following: 1/1, 1/2."

fieldvalidation.name: FA-26C-A15
fieldvalidation.comment: "When Type is SAEG, Denomination must be one of the following: 1/1."
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "When Type is SAEG, Denomination must be one of the following: 1/1."

fieldvalidation.name: FA-26C-A16
fieldvalidation.comment: "When Type is SECU, Denomination must be one of the following: 5."
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "When Type is SECU, Denomination must be one of the following: 5."

fieldvalidation.name: FA-26C-A17
fieldvalidation.comment: "When Type is STAT, Denomination must be one of the following: 20, 10, 5."
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "When Type is STAT, Denomination must be one of the following: 20, 10, 5."

fieldvalidation.name: FA-26C-A18
fieldvalidation.comment: "When Type is VREN, Denomination must be one of the following: 20, 10."
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "When Type is VREN, Denomination must be one of the following: 20, 10."

fieldvalidation.name: FA-26C-A19
fieldvalidation.comment: "When Type is NBUF , Denomination must be one of the following: 50."
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "When Type is NBUF , Denomination must be one of the following: 50."

fieldvalidation.name: FA-26C-B
fieldvalidation.comment: $value + " is not a valid Type value. When identifying a commodity, one of the following codes must be used: GOLD, SILV, PLAT, PALL, OTHR ,POIL ,STEE, TITA ,RHOD, RUTH, OSMI, IRID. When Type is used to identify a coin, one of the following codes must be used: AMEG, ANUG, CORO, BRIT, DUCA, FRFR, GECU, KRUG, LBTY, MAPL, MEXP, NBUF , NSOV, NOBL, OSOV, SAEG, SECU, STAT, VREN, COIN."
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: $value + " is not a valid Type value. When identifying a commodity, one of the following codes must be used: GOLD, SILV, PLAT, PALL, OTHR ,POIL ,STEE, TITA ,RHOD, RUTH, OSMI, IRID. When Type is used to identify a coin, one of the following codes must be used: AMEG, ANUG, CORO, BRIT, DUCA, FRFR, GECU, KRUG, LBTY, MAPL, MEXP, NBUF , NSOV, NOBL, OSOV, SAEG, SECU, STAT, VREN, COIN."

fieldvalidation.name: FB-32F-A
fieldvalidation.comment: "Amount must not contain more than six digits following the decimal comma."
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "Amount must not contain more than six digits following the decimal comma."

fieldvalidation.name: FC-32F-A
fieldvalidation.comment: "Amount must not contain more than six digits following the decimal comma."
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "Amount must not contain more than six digits following the decimal comma."

fieldvalidation.name: ERI
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "In an ERI field (i.e. fields 61, 72, 77A, 79, 86) the data part of a code word /OCMT/, or /CHGS/, is being validated, but the ending separator (i.e. third slash) is missing or the code words are duplicated."

fieldvalidation.name: FA-22-D
fieldvalidation.comment: FA-22-D Common Reference must contain the bank and location codes of the Sender and Receiver, ie, their BIC without the country code(Error code(s): T95).
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "Common Reference must contain the bank and location codes of the Sender and Receiver, ie, their BIC without the country code"

fieldvalidation.name: FD-77A-ERI
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "In an ERI field (i.e. fields 61, 72, 77A, 79, 86) the data part of a code word /OCMT/, or /CHGS/, is being validated, but the ending separator (i.e. third slash) is missing or the code words are duplicated."

fieldvalidation.name: FA-72-1
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "Any line in field 72 should not start with code /PUSI/, /PUTI/, /USI/ or /UTI/."

FormulaFunctionDef.name: IsSwiftSequenceEmpty
FormulaFunctionDef.description: Returns false if the sequence is empty. If the sequence has atleast one valid field present, returns true.
